title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti until al dente.
2. Fry pancetta until crisp.
3. Beat eggs and parmesan together.
4. Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
5. Quickly stir in egg mixture.
6. Season with salt and black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
2. Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
3. Sauté onions and garlic until soft.
4. Add tomato puree and simmer 10 minutes.
5. Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer 5 more minutes.
6. Season and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef strips cooked in a creamy mushroom and onion sauce, served over noodles or rice.
instructions:
1. Cook beef in butter until browned, remove and set aside.
2. Sauté onions and garlic, add mushrooms and cook until soft.
3. Sprinkle flour and stir.
4. Add beef broth, simmer until thickened.
5. Stir in sour cream and return beef.
6. Serve over noodles or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy and garlic sauce.
instructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a wok.
2. Add garlic and stir-fry 30 seconds.
3. Add vegetables and stir-fry 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and season to taste.
5. Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
summary: Stir-fried rice tossed with shrimp, eggs, peas, carrots, and soy sauce for a quick meal.
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a wok, cook shrimp until pink and remove.
2. Scramble eggs and remove.
3. Stir-fry carrots and peas until tender.
4. Add rice, shrimp, eggs, and soy sauce.
5. Mix well and season to taste.
6. Serve hot.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple and delicious pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
2. Roll out pizza dough.
3. Spread tomato sauce over dough.
4. Add mozzarella slices.
5. Bake 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
6. Top with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil before serving.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumber, tomato, feta cheese, olives, and a light vinaigrette.
instructions:
1. Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
2. Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
3. Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
4. Serve fresh.
